nodes.text: A clone trooper cloned from the Mandalorian bounty hunter, Jango Fett, served in the Grand Army of the Republic during the Clone Wars fought between the Galactic Republic and Confederacy of Independent Systems. In 20 BBY, the clone trooper was wounded by shrapnel during a battle on the planet Drongar while in the Poptree Forest. He was taken to Republic Mobile Surgical Unit 7 where the surgeon, Jos Vondar, operated on his wounds.
